website_summaries.verdict: Premium barbecue rubs that mimic some of the best-known American BBQ styles.
pros: Nice collection of rubs that will give you amazing flavors, with a few different choices and flavors in each set
Perfect fit for many different types of grilling or smoking
These spices and rubs are free from gluten and MSG
cons: May be too mild for some people

customer_reviews.title: which was amazing. Everyone said it was the best turkey they ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted new dry rubs to try with my Pit Barrel Cooker(Which I love). So far I have tried the New Orleans style on a turkey, which was amazing. Everyone said it was the best turkey they ever had. I also used the Memphis on a pork butt and made pulled pork and I tried both the Memphis and Carolina on whole chickens. It was all fantastic. I was new to smoking and BBQing but these and my PBC are so simple and they come out so good, my friends think I'm some kind of BBQ savant haha. Just try them you won't be disappointed. Going tot to try them on wings next.
customer_reviews.author: William Olson

customer_reviews.title: Lip-Smackin' BBQ - my fav of all time
customer_reviews.text: I love to BBQ. Not smoke, BBQ. I'm also usually pressed for time so I'm cooking more quickly than I should. But I still want things to taste great. I've tried a few different rubs, all were ok, usable. And then the BBQ Bros Southern Style kit arrived. I tasted each one - no overpowering salt! Instead, great, unique, USABLE flavors. Each BBQ is now an incredible experience of flavors, and for the life of me - perhaps a first - I can't even tell you which one I like the best - they are each that good. They've got me hooked on their product, that is for sure. Great job BBQ Bros!
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 you can spend on BBQ seasonings
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I give things like this a little while before I write a review so I can try it on various foods. Not this stuff! After throwing each of the 3 types on some chicken breasts I was BLOWN AWAY. Smoked them for around 2 and a half hours and each of the rubs made your taste buds dance. The Memphis is my fave, but the New Orleans is a close second. Will definitely be getting some other types from you guys to try!
customer_reviews.author: James Shillingburg

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Well to good that is
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Well to good that is. I'll have to reorder soon but because my family likes them all I'll just reorder this same sample pack. Nice large containers. Lots if rub. Problems is my family likes them so much that they are putting this stuff on EVERYTHING! Eggs, French fries, chilli, steak, pork chops, yes a hot dog and last night we took some popcorn to the drive inn and what did I taste, yeah you guessed it. They are even mixing flavors together. good stuff. Going to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Jason on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good combination of flavors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for easy rubs for smoking meat. As someone who is new to using a smoker, I don't have my own run recipe yet. These are are all great, and I'm looking forward to buying some bbq bro's other seasonings. I can see myself using these for more than just in the smoker. I'll definitely be using them on the charcoal grill as well! I really appreciate the minimal number of ingredients. No oddball chemicals and colors.
customer_reviews.author: DannyWK

customer_reviews.title: One was not full
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I needed. Christmas gift for dad. I'm pretty disappointed that one of the seasonings wasn't full but the other two were, but all 3 were completely sealed. Maybe poor quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: 1 bad apple in the bunch
customer_reviews.text: It is a shame that I am writing a negative review about this product because I love it. However, this time I ordered and I did not check the seal under the cap when it first arrived; two of the three seals were open and it is too late to return. I am very upset about this. I understand mistakes happen and it may have even occurred during shipment but I'm out of money, two jars of rub and meat sitting on the counter that I can't season the way I wanted. That aside, still good flavor from the company in general... just bad luck this one time I hope. See update on 9/8/20
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: We are new to home smoking, going old-school with a charcoal unit. We have used the Memphis style on pork butt and spare ribs with great results, and did a brisket with the Carolina that came out perfect. Following some suggestions we rub the meat down with prepared yellow mustard before applying the dry rub. I have used the Memphis style worked into ground chuck with some fine chopped onion for burgers on the grill with truly good results. Great product, great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Muddthe1st

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of a beginner to this, but I used the Memphis rub in a brine with additional salt for a nice grassfed brisket I wanted to smoke and then did a dry rub with 1 part in 8 fresh ground coffee added to this mix. Mixed very well. Not to sweet, not too salty. Good blend. I've yet to try the others.
customer_reviews.author: Al R

customer_reviews.title: Good for smoking
customer_reviews.text: I came to own a smoker recently and was curious how to cook with it and how to flavor the meats. I tried to make rubs myself but they fell short of tasting good. These rubs are easy and cheap and taste great. I think bang for buck these take the cake.
customer_reviews.author: tedga77

customer_reviews.title: Great Rubs
customer_reviews.text: So delicious all three. My son LOVES the New Orleans flavor the most :-D
customer_reviews.author: SD PADRES FAN

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seasoning set for my dad. The containers are huge! My dad said he has enough to last for months and he loves all the flavors. I'll be purchasing another for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: One of the best dry rubs I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I used these on a brisket, beef ribs, and pork lion that I smoked for the Super Bowl, all turned out great. The only bad was there were no left overs. I had forgotten to stash some aside for the rest of the week and they were gone almost as fast as I could slice them up and lay them out, which is why I don't have any pictures to put up.
customer_reviews.author: mbongi

customer_reviews.title: These are about average.
customer_reviews.text: These rubs are about average. What I don't like about them is they are only available as a set. Singles aren't available. The Carolina Style is really pepper hot. Go easy with this stuff. You could ruin a good steak easily.
customer_reviews.author: E E

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best seasoning I've ever tasted. I put it on everything! :) The Carolina is bold with red pepper flakes in it, the others are great as well. All have good flavor with no overpowering salt in it. They allow you to add more at your own convenience if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Korey  Prendergast

customer_reviews.title: BBQ BROS RUBS {Southern Style} is perfection!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to cooking with each individual flavor, having bought the Southern Style assorted set of 3. Each one is remarkably delicious in it's own way. I will happily stick with this brand forever. These dry rubs are nothing short of superb.
customer_reviews.author: Eastlake III

customer_reviews.title: Love all 3 of these
customer_reviews.text: Love all 3 of these! I smoke ribs, pork loin, chicken, etc. The New Orleans rub is BOMB on chicken or turkey, and the other 2 work great on pork!! 2nd time I've bought this trio and will be buying again I guarantee that.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!  Great blends, and flavors!
customer_reviews.text: Solid spices! Now, many will argue that at the end of the day all spices are more-or-less the same just given that there's only so many things you can combine and it still be "stomach-able". Well, it's all about the quantity of each - "a little bit of this, more of this, whole lot of that". These guys did a great job, and I enjoy the various styles. I'm still trying them out, but overall quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very good rubs
customer_reviews.text: Have used rubs on 2 occasions when smoking ribs and pork belly. Great flavors, pork ribs came out awesome.
customer_reviews.author: KBman

customer_reviews.title: Decent rubs
customer_reviews.text: The carolina and the Memphis tasted like the same rub to me. They're decent but MeatChurch has better rubs
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pena

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have in the last three days used all three, on a smoked rib eye steak,a rack of St Louis cut ribs and a spatchcocked chicken,all three turned out super well , seasoned.
customer_reviews.author: Clement W.

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my guys at the house that like spicy seasonings and they love it on all meats!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday gift
customer_reviews.text: Each year we give dad this, as he is the BBQ King. These last about a year! Then we order more for his holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Clayton Blaine, MA, LMFT

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother, who shoes horses out in Colorado, for Chriatmas. He called the first time he used it and said it was "freaking amazing!"
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Flavors are savory with a mild heat.
customer_reviews.text: Really great flavor. I've tried them on brisket, turkey and beef tenderloin with great results. Cooked the turkey and brisket on a pellet smoker. The tenderloin was done on a kettle grill with mesquite wood.
customer_reviews.author: B.G.

customer_reviews.title: Go to Rub!
customer_reviews.text: For the best ribs and smoked meats. This pack offers a nice selection of regions in one box. I particularly like to mix and blend them-- I not only bought these once, but have bought them several times and will again! Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Ole Smoky

customer_reviews.title: Good rubs
customer_reviews.text: Too bad it was given as a gift. Would have been better off keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Far West

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these.
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time, they are great. I will be reordering when this batch runs out.
customer_reviews.author: F.A.B

customer_reviews.title: Contains Ethoxyquin
customer_reviews.text: I threw away this set and went through Amazon's chat support for a refund since this is non-returnable. Please research Ethoxyquin. It's an ingredient that is not listed anywhere on this product page, but as you can see in the pic, it's clearly in the bottle. Avoid this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Arun

customer_reviews.title: Good flavors
customer_reviews.text: Memphis is the best especially on chicken in the smoker. Carolina is really good as well slight kick. New Orleans surprised me it has a kick used it on shrimp as it said for seafood/fish family said it was too spicy. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Have not tried all of them yet.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I used the New Orleans style for my Shrimp and Grits dish seasoning this morning and was very satisfied. So, based on that one dish I can rate that particular rub as a Five.
customer_reviews.author: NATIVE NEW YORKER

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've used all three of these and I'm very pleased. Used the Memphis rub (& my Treager) on a pork loin this evening and it was a great success.
customer_reviews.author: S. Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Way too much salt
customer_reviews.text: BBQ is about flavor...not sodium. All three of the spices are overwhelmingly salty. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Stieglitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Used the Louisiana rub couple days ago on some spare ribs.....Folks and myself included felt they were the best they have ever had. Green Egg helps but I give the rubs a nod as I was nervous as my last spice rub company I was using is no longer in business.
customer_reviews.author: boom98

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to order the large bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are the best rubs I have ever used. Everybody at my last cook went crazy over them. They blossom into full flavor after cooking. Just sticking your finger in the bottle for a taste will not give you the true end flavor.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Maccubbin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rubs
customer_reviews.text: Received for Fathers Day gift used all three flavors the same weekend when I smoked ribs. Family loved them flavor was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Bottle smashed
customer_reviews.text: It was given as a gift and just opened it and found it to be damaged, still useable but still doesn't look nice. The box was in perfect shape just the bottle is Ben
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: A little goes along way
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. I BBQ about 5 times a week and have enjoyed using these dry rubs all of them have Great flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Improves flavor of food
customer_reviews.text: I liked the distinctive flavor enhancement of the product on the food, whether it was meat or fish. It really made the food taste more delicious.
customer_reviews.author: EvelynRudolph

customer_reviews.title: First time user (will buy again)
customer_reviews.text: Love this three pak. Tried boththe Memthis and Carolina on Brisket. Incredible!!!! Going to be my new GO TO rubs.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Rub
customer_reviews.text: Great BBQ rubs for the money and the flavor is amazing. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Paul Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: These rubs are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I tried all 3 of the rubs on 3 slabs of ribs. And my family was pleasantly surprised by the different flavors that these rubs brought to the table! In fact, there was barely any left for me! I highly recommend you give these rubs a try!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Spicy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my son-in-law who loves to grill & smoke. He said they were good. That's all I know about them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Smoking !
customer_reviews.text: I used Memphis and Carolina styles on some pork belly, and pork chops that I put on the smoker for thanksgiving munchies . They didn't last long . Great blend of flavor , and not overpowered by salt . I am looking forward to using on wings and ribs. I'm happy I gave these a shot
customer_reviews.author: Maggie T.

customer_reviews.title: I've used the Memphis rub on some chicken wings and they were good without sauce
customer_reviews.text: These rubs are delicious. I've used the Memphis rub on some chicken wings and they were good without sauce. I've also used the New Orleans with some shrimp and again they came out good. I will be using the Carolina soon. All of the food was cooked on a Big Green Egg. I will definitely consider buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Teacher

customer_reviews.title: id recomend it.
customer_reviews.text: not overly salty as a lot of rubs can be. good flavor out of all 3 types. Carolina and Memphis are my 2 best . not the new orleans isint good . i just haven't used it yet. when you open the cans there's is a fresh smell to it,not a bland smell like commercial type of rubs..
customer_reviews.author: x infektid x

customer_reviews.title: Buy it...
customer_reviews.text: What a great collection. Ordered the Western style pack before this one. Both are awesome. I used to mix my own spices, but why bother. For the same price you can have someone else do it for you with a better variety of flavors. Have been very happy with them so far. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: 100% Hides all the flavor of the Pork!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff should not even be on Pork, I don't like this stuff at all, I want something to enhance the pork flavor not hide it all together. It also is more of a beef flavor not pork. Save your money buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmys Place

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: It took me awhile to get this review posted becuse I wanted to try all three flavors before leaving comments. These are terrific. Each has it's own distinct flavor and is a great dry rub. I used one for grill cooking, one for smoking, and one for baking. I don't think you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Keith O

customer_reviews.title: MEMPHIS IS ENOUGH TO CONVINCE ME!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Southern Style BBQ BRO Combo. I have now used the Memphis mix on three dishes and couldn't be happier. New Orleans and Carolina will soon follow, but judging from the first version, I know they are all going to be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Great Rubs!
customer_reviews.text: Great spice assortment if you're into cooking or grilling, you'll look like a pro with these rubs!
customer_reviews.author: RayK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spicy rubs.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rubs, they are a bit spicy, so be prepared for that, and I like spicy food. Used no my pork and beef smoked items. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great aroma
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried yet but they sure do smell mighty good other wise I would probably give five stars
customer_reviews.author: sharkbait

customer_reviews.title: all our guests LOVED the food and flavor
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased a smoker and kind of went on a spree buying different rubs/woods/brines. First time out I used the Memphis rub on some ribs and New Orleans on 2 whole chickens. Both were delicious and while I as a self-critical person made a few mistakes adjusting to the new smoker, all our guests LOVED the food and flavor. We went down south immediately after and had BBQ down there as well and my wife and father both commented how they can't wait to eat my stuff again. Can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavors
customer_reviews.text: So far I have tried both the New Orleans Style and Memphis Style rubs on some racks of pork ribs that I smoked last weekend, and both were very good. Great flavors. Haven't tried the Carolina Style rub yet, but I'm sure it will be equally as good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ives

customer_reviews.title: ... on a gas grill and it was nothing but perfect. The best ribs I tasted period
customer_reviews.text: Cannot really compared with other rubs but I make my first ever smoke ribs on a gas grill and it was nothing but perfect. The best ribs I tasted period!
customer_reviews.author: newfly

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and large size
customer_reviews.text: GREAT gift for the BBQ connoisseur in your life. These are NOT small containers. It’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Manica

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this but I think there are ways to season the meat more effectively.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I love to cook food on the grill and have used ...
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook food on the grill and have used many types of dry rubs and this is the best rubs I have ever used. Sometimes you're just too lazy to make your own rubs and the BBQ BROS RUBS have the best ingredients and I have all six rubs. No need to add additional ingredients for chicken, ribs, burgers, pull pork or briskets. Best rubs; wished I could buy locally!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Rubs for any meat :-)
customer_reviews.text: I used the Carolina and Memphis rubs on smoked ribs and chicken thighs. Guests at my BBQ loved it, the Memphis rub is great on ribs, no added sauce needed. Once of the best rubs I have used in years of smoking ribs.
customer_reviews.author: LGUNZ

customer_reviews.title: These were recommended to me by a friend and I can say ...
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to me by a friend and I can say that they are amazing. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ka

customer_reviews.title: Buy these now!
customer_reviews.text: First order of these were a gift to me - LOVE these rubs. Carolina style on baby backs is my favorite. Memphis right behind, either with a vinegar mustard sauce. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Flavorless
customer_reviews.text: Very little actual flavor, the Traeger dry rub is far better honestly. 2 of the tamper seals were already broken allowing moisture in resulting in clumped up "dry" rub.
customer_reviews.author: Thermopylae

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my boyfriend and we both enjoy them. Great flavor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandfather. He absolutely loves them! He just made 4 racks of ribs using these spices and a few of his own. When he served the meat, everyone scarfed it down. Needless to say, they were satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: We used the Memphis rub on a turkey that we roasted and it was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Costine

customer_reviews.title: Decent Rubs
customer_reviews.text: Tried the Memphis rub so far on a slab of ribs. The rub was pretty good. Looking forward to trying the New Orleans rub soon.
customer_reviews.author: MiltHouse

customer_reviews.title: Good BBQ and Good Times
customer_reviews.text: We used the Memphis Style Rub on a pork shoulder, rubbed it in well and let it sit overnight. The finished shoulder after smoking it low and slow was well balanced between the sweet and spicy flavor notes. It gave us a nice bark on the outside and it cooked evenly throughout. It reminded us of "Memphis In May".
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Quite impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them once on grilled chicken, but so far quite impressed. Not too salty. Decidedly different flavors for all three. These are large containers and well worth the price. I'll add more as I use them more through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Berger

customer_reviews.title: They are very generous in size as well and great addition to the gift box
customer_reviews.text: This is part of a Christmas Gift box I put together for my boyfriend for his new Barbecue. I/we haven't had the opportunity to try them as of yet, but looking forward to it. They are very generous in size as well and great addition to the gift box.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: have not touched yet
customer_reviews.text: just a few days ago received, I have not yet tried or tasted. from out side view of these 3 containers, it look good. sorry can not offer any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great spice for grilling
customer_reviews.text: This spice has been the sensation of my picnics for the past few months. Great for out door grilling. Every one love the back home flavor. I take this spice with me on the ship to flavor my food. will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Suchie4life

customer_reviews.title: Ordered as gift, they love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seasoning set as a gift for a friend who loves to grill and smoke meat. I have not personally tried the spices yet so I can only give it four stars, but he has told me that they have great flavor. I would definitely recommend them to anyone who likes to BBQ, and I plan on ordering some for myself soon!
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: HOT AND UNIQUE TASTE
customer_reviews.text: WOW! HOT! now I don't have to waste so much time in making my BBQ RUB, and meat taste better and unique, will be trying your other product also, thanks
customer_reviews.author: CONLEY C.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor for Baby Back Ribs!
customer_reviews.text: I have only tired the Memphis Style Rub so far and it was terrific. I managed to find a Memphis BBQ sauce to go with the finished baby back ribs I made. One suggestion would be for BBQ Bros to market one bottle rub with two matching BBQ sauce bottles and sell that as a set. You would triple your winners! Love the rub.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Just made some candied Bacon with the New Orleans Rub! My clogged arteries thank you! Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: paul atwood

customer_reviews.title: My brisket and ribs have never tasted so good. Please consider trying their products if you take ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea of the mix of ingredients in this company's products, whatever they are is phenomenal. My brisket and ribs have never tasted so good. Please consider trying their products if you take pride in offering your family and guests something that is out of this world.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I was hesitant at first
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was hesitant at first. No regrets. Everyone who's had it, loved it. The only rub on haven't tried yet is the New Orleans. It smells amazing though.
customer_reviews.author: D.Keo

customer_reviews.title: Large size and nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my dad and he's now mentioned several times how often he uses them and how much he likes the flavors. He loves to cookout so it was a good gift. The bottles are pretty big and should last a while! He says all the flavors are versatile on different meats.
customer_reviews.author: MBJ

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: They were ok. Tried the Carolina on a smoked chicken wasn't anything special also used the Memphis on a brisket and felt it was a little under flavored
customer_reviews.author: vinnie

customer_reviews.title: ... far on a pork butt and it turned out pretty good. Not my all time favorite but a ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used the Memphis Style so far on a pork butt and it turned out pretty good. Not my all time favorite but a good quality rub!
customer_reviews.author: Christina W.

customer_reviews.title: Each of the three seasonings are a nice blend of spices
customer_reviews.text: Each of the three seasonings are a nice blend of spices. None of them have a overwhelming ingredient they just add the right amount flavor for a great taste to whatever you're preparing.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Finally get to try them all, the Carolina is the most spicy one, they are just right, not too salty. Sure will buy more when run out.
customer_reviews.author: pakeonoahu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bit too spicy for us but I'm sure it's great for others.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaB

customer_reviews.title: Each blend unique from the other. Plenty of spices ...
customer_reviews.text: Each blend unique from the other. Plenty of spices without filler; you don't need to cake on the rub for flavor, which makes it quite economical.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Zweigler

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Have used a couple of these rubs and they are very good!
customer_reviews.author: GBD

customer_reviews.title: Three Fabulous Rubs!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new "taste" and found it "three times over" Great flavor!
customer_reviews.author: LizFromNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor Enhancer
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is a Christmas gift for my son. He loves and swears by them! They certainly add great flavor to BBQs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cheshier

customer_reviews.title: Great low salt rubs
customer_reviews.text: Most barbecue rubs have a great deal of salt. These have some salt but not a great amount. They are trying to duplicate the taste of barbecue in Memphis, New Orleans and Carolina. Don't know how authentic they are-not familiar with the barbecue in these areas. We are very happy with the taste of all of them. Use them often on meat and seafood. They are a good price-when you buy 6 which we did they offer a discount. We bought 3 of the Western and 3 of the Southern. If you want to watch your salt intake then these are highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S.J.

customer_reviews.title: Speedy Delivery for Quality Spices
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with how quickly my order processed and shipped. I was also pleasantly surprised by the size of the spice containers - this is a lot of spice for the money! This was purchased as a gift so I cannot yet review the tastiness of these spices, but they certainly look delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good spice trio
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the New Orleans rub on pork loin strips. It’s flavorful and grills nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Nebel

customer_reviews.title: Great rub set
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my purchase of the BBQ Brothers rub set. It was a great value for the money and the flavor of each one was great. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Root

customer_reviews.title: Great Dry Rub
customer_reviews.text: I use as dry rub on pork ribs. Much more flavor than the big bottles available in the big box stores. Each of the three has a somewhat different highlighted flavor. Still undecided as to which one is my favorite. Like them all!!!
customer_reviews.author: 3puttphil

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews on these--all were excellent. I have already used all three and all of them are great and have terrific flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: A great set of BBQ spices
customer_reviews.text: These spices are excellent. I used the Memphis with a pork shoulder recently and it was fantastic. Used it on the smoker with hickory chips. Outstanding flavor. No filler in these spices, all flavor
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Great Mix
customer_reviews.text: Great mix of spices. Versatile uses. Adds great flavor to those Smokin' Ribs, Chicken or some really good Louisanne style shrimp on barby.
customer_reviews.author: Vern_P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rubs and great taste
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rubs and great taste. Made the ribs come out melt in your mouth. Would definitely use the product agajn
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Tried all three products last weekend, great flavor with each and really enhances whatever you are cooking. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for my brother who bought a smoker. Flavors are delicious. Would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubs were a hit!
customer_reviews.text: We love the rubs!! We have used all three and had yummy meat every time! It has been good on chicken....ribs....and TriTip! Can't wait to try the others!
customer_reviews.author: Kendricks5

product_meta.title: BBQ BROS RUBS {Southern Style} - Ultimate Barbecue Spices Seasoning Set - Use for Grilling, Cooking, Smoking - Meat Rub, Dry Marinade, Rib Rub - Backed with 100% Customer Guarantee
